meanings.definition: A salt or ester of acetylsalicylic acid, commonly known as aspirin.
meanings.sent1: I took some acetylsalicylate for my headache.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed acetylsalicylate to reduce inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The acetylsalicylate jumped out of the medicine cabinet and danced around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like acetylsalicylate, soothing the pain in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The acetylsalicylate sparkled like diamonds in the sunlight.
